h1.title: Convert PNG to TIFF Online
h1.description: Free PNG to TIFF converter with lossless compression options and print-ready output. Works on any device — no signup required.

converter.title: PNG to TIFF Converter
converter.description: Convert PNG images to TIFF with LZW/ZIP lossless compression while preserving alpha transparency.

h2.title: Why Convert PNG to TIFF?
h2.description:
TIFF is a professional, archival-grade format used in imaging and print:

  • Lossless options: Keep a clean master without introducing new artifacts.
  • Print-ready: Great for high-resolution output and prepress workflows.
  • Alpha support: Can preserve transparency (reader-dependent).
  • Editing-friendly: Stable for repeated saves and hand-offs.

h2.title: How to Convert PNG to TIFF Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload PNG and choose your file.
  2. Wait for processing.
  3. Click Download TIFF to save the result.

Default output: 32-bit RGBA, LZW lossless, 300 DPI.

h2.title: TIFF vs PNG: Key Differences
h2.description:
• Compression: PNG uses lossless DEFLATE; TIFF supports LZW/ZIP (lossless) or others.
  • File size: Depends on image content; TIFF can be larger or similar to PNG.
  • Transparency: Both can include alpha (viewer support may vary for TIFF).
  • Best for: PNG for web delivery; TIFF for editing, print, and archiving.

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: PNG (image/png)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: TIFF (.tiff, MIME image/tiff)
  • Defaults: 32-bit RGBA, LZW compression, 300 DPI

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• File too large: TIFF is heavier for some content — keep PNG for web or consider WebP/AVIF.
  • Alpha not visible: Some viewers ignore TIFF alpha; verify in a pro editor.
  • Color shift: Convert to sRGB before upload for consistent on-screen color.
  • Upload fails: Ensure PNG ≤ 16 MB.

faq.question: Is this PNG to TIFF converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: Will TIFF work on all applications?
faq.answer: TIFF is widely supported in professional apps (Photoshop, Affinity, many RIP/print tools). Some simple viewers may not display alpha or certain compression methods.

faq.question: How big are TIFF files vs PNG?
faq.answer: It varies by image. With LZW/ZIP, TIFF can be similar or larger than PNG depending on content.

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Can I convert multiple PNGs at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time. For bulk needs, repeat the process or use a batch tool.

faq.question: Does TIFF support layers?
faq.answer: Standard TIFF is flat. Some apps embed private layer data, but this tool outputs a flat TIFF.

note: TIFF phù hợp lưu trữ/ấn loát nhưng có thể nặng. Cho web, cân nhắc PNG/WebP/AVIF.
